text:
Luxury hotels on Mallorca and Crete present themselves at loop 2016   
Sep 09, 2015 eTN   
When one hundred exceptional boutique hotels, Grand Resorts and fine tradition houses from around the world present themselves to the audience in Frankfurt from April 10 to 13, 2016, the following two should not be missed: Castell Son Claret in the Southwest of Mallorca and member of the Leading Hotels of the World and Five-Star Resort & Spa Blue Palace on Crete. Both hotels are among the exhibitors of the luxury fair loop – Luxury on our Planet. The exhibition provides a business platform for international luxury hotels where they exclusively meet Top Buyers from the German speaking markets. 
A Majorcan monument, the newly opened Castell Son Claret impressively blends the historic splendor of a manor house with contemporary arts and interiors. First mentioned in 1450, the estate has been refurbished to the highest standards and it claims to make you feel home in a private house. Guests enjoy a complete escape from the noises of modern life; only nature and the elements are audible throughout the 326 acres property, providing a truly relaxing and reinvigorating experience. At the foot of the Tramuntana Mountains, the majestic beauty of nature is creating a display of flowers and plants that appeal to all senses. It is also here that Fernando Perez Arellano and his team find the inspiration to prepare unforgettable combinations served in the Michelin star-awarded “Zaranda” and the restaurant “Olivera” with their tranquil patios and terraces. castellsonclaret.com 
Overlooking a sparkling blue bay, Blue Palace, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, is nestled between the famed coast of Elounda and the relics of historic Spinalonga Island. Each of the 251 luxuriously appointed guest rooms, comprising elegant bungalows, exclusive suites and four stunning private villas, overlooks the incandescent Aegean Sea, whereby 142 of them boast private pools that appear to flow directly to the sea. Premier facilities, unbeatable service and a romantic atmosphere set the idyllic resort apart. Showcasing exquisite cuisine in myriad magical settings, Blue Palace features five exclusive restaurants offering a variety of cuisine from traditional Greek to Asian Fusion, Italian delights and the Steakhouse Flame. Leisure facilities include a private beach with comfy sunbeds and umbrellas and three outdoor swimming pools, as well as water sports and the world class Elounda Spa & Thalassotherapy.
